about_the_game:
"Beneath The Surface" is a terrifying first-person survival horror experience that combines psychological tension, immersive exploration, intense combat, and spine-chilling encounters. Dive into the depths of a foreboding forest, uncover dark secrets, and fight for survival as you descend into a hellish underground world.

Enter a world where light reveals hope, but darkness hides unspeakable horrors. With exploration, puzzles, and shooter mechanics, "Beneath The Surface" will push your courage and sanity to their limits. Will you escape, or will the nightmare consume you?Begin the search! Expect A dark, linear horror experience with 30–40 minutes of gripping gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mature themes, graphic violence, and disturbing imagery. It features intense psychological horror elements, including unsettling visuals and scenes that may not be suitable for all audiences. Player discretion is advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 470, 4GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X ／ Intel Core i5-12600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12 GB / RX 6700 XT GAMING 12GB
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: A man searches for his missing friends in the woods and discovers an abandoned property with dark secrets. As the horrors unravel, a deranged inhabitant drags him into a supernatural nightmare. Uncover the truth, face psychological terrors, and fight to survive—or lose your sanity.
